definition: pool/pond/(of metals etc) luster/favor or beneficence/damp/moist

sentences.english: Lake Taihu, Hongze and Caohu are already in eutrophic state.
sentences.chinese: 太湖，洪澤湖和巢湖富營養化曾經在狀況。

sentences.english: In contrast , water level of the Hongze Lake in the lower reaches has been rising.
sentences.chinese: 相比之下，原本較低的洪澤湖水位又比以前增高了。

sentences.english: Huai River is one of the 7 largest river of our country and is the main supply water source to Hongze Lake.
sentences.chinese: 淮河是我國七大河流之一，是洪澤湖的主要補給水源。

definition: Liberation city district/Jiefang district of Jiaozuo city 焦作市[Jiao1 zuo4 shi4], Henan
New Fourth army of Republic of China, set up in 1937 and controlled by the communists
Autumn Harvest Uprising (1927), insurrection in Hunan and Jiangxi provinces led by Mao Zedong
Pingxing Pass, mountain pass in Shanxi Province
Chen Jiongming (1878-1933), a leading warlord of Guangdong faction, defeated in 1925 and fled to Hong Kong
Luo Ronghuan (1902-1963), Chinese communist military leader
Jingyang County in Xianyang 咸陽|咸阳[Xian2 yang2], Shaanxi
Lishi district of Lüliang city 呂梁市|吕梁市[Lu:3 liang2 shi4], Shanxi 山西
Xiang Ying (1898-1941), communist general involved in forming the New Fourth Army 新四軍, killed in 1941 during the New Fourth Army incident 皖南事变
